name: Yummy Yucky
description:
Help a character collect their favourite food while avoiding their least favourite in this light and simple game suitable for very young children.

This is my first attempt to design a game for a Brain Computer Interface (See https://itch.io/jam/bci-game-jam) but it can be played on any computer using the SPACE button only. Press the space button when the character, food item, or direction you desire is highlighted.
